pageProduct.name: Optislim VLCD Platinum Salted Caramel 21x25g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Nutritionally complete meal replacement when used 3 times a day for accelerated weight loss. Mixed with skim milk for that real amazing milkshake taste with the added benefits of Glucommanan, Green Coffee Extract and Ginseng to help with hunger and boost weight loss.

Warnings

Not suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding women, children and adolescents. If you have any medical conditions or are taking medication, please consult a Healthcare Professional before using this product.

Common Uses

For the dietary management of obesity

Ingredients

Wheat Protein, Soybean Oil Powder [Refined Soybean Oil, Glucose Syrup Solids, Milk Protein, Emulsifier (451i),
Anti-caking Agent (551), Antioxidant (307b)], Milk Solids, Milk Protein (Soy Lecithin), Minerals [Calcium
Hydrogen Phosphate, Potassium Dihydrogen Phosphate, Magnesium Oxide, Ferric Pyrophosphate, Chromium
Chloride, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Molybdate, Zinc Oxide, Sodium Selenite, Copper Sulphate, Manganese
Sulphate], Glucomannan, Flavours, Mineral Salts (508, 451), Maltodextrin, Food Acid (331), Corn Starch,
Vegetable Gum (412), Salt, Green Coffee Extract, Colours (150a, 100), Vitamins [Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin
B3, Vitamin A, Vitamin B5, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12, Vitamin B2, Biotin, Vitamin B1],
Ginseng Root Extract (Eleutherococcus senticosus), Sweetener (955). CONTAINS GLUTEN, MILK, SOY AND CAFFEINE.

Directions

Replace each meal with one sachet, up to three meals can be replaced each day. Mix 200ml of skim milk with contents of sachet and shake or blend to dissolve, drink immediately. Once prepared any unused portions should be discarded, it should not be stored for use at a later time.
